com.skysql.java

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skysql.java.Encryption

  • public class Encryption
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the means to encrypt data to be sent to the API.
    Author:
    Massimo Siani

      Constructor.

      Decrypts the given string using the given key.
      java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String string, java.lang.String key)
      Encrypts the given string using the given key and a (pseudo)random salt.

        public Encryption()

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String string,
                       java.lang.String key)
        Encrypts the given string using the given key and a (pseudo)random salt. Returns the encrypted string or an empty string if the MD5 algorithm cannot be found at runtime.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to be encrypted
        key - the encryption key
        Returns:
        the encrypted string or an empty string on errors

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String encryptedString,
                       java.lang.String key)
        Decrypts the given string using the given key. This method only works with strings encrypted with the encrypt method in this class. Returns the original string.
        Parameters:
        encryptedString - the encrypted string
        key - the encryption key
        Returns:
        the decrypted original string
